cms.emailtemplate.EmailTemplateDisplayName: E-commerce - Order status notification to customer

Status of your order has changed.

The status of your order has changed to '{% Order.OrderStatus.DisplayName|(encode)true |(identity)GlobalAdministrator|(hash)7587e90ea9c2bcd5e2b83615e3d3140de0879ef979f2d9a9412a3dca1e528cb1%}'.
